tasks.label: Run: Visual Report
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration visual-report --out "./salidas/visual" --basename "visual_demo" && open "./salidas/visual/visual_demo.pdf"

tasks.label: Run: AutoCAD (DXF offline demo)
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration autocad construction --L 12 --B 3.8 --T 1.8 --out "./salidas/autocad" && open "./salidas/autocad"

tasks.label: Run: AutoCAD (Plano de Líneas)
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration autocad lines --L 12 --B 3.8 --T 1.8 --out "./salidas/autocad" && open "./salidas/autocad"

tasks.label: Run: AutoCAD (Cuadernas)
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration autocad frames --L 12 --B 3.8 --T 1.8 --out "./salidas/autocad" && open "./salidas/autocad"

tasks.label: Run: AutoCAD (Todos)
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration autocad all --L 12 --B 3.8 --T 1.8 --out "./salidas/autocad" && open "./salidas/autocad"

tasks.label: Run: Grid Optimization
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration grid-opt --L 95 100 --B 14 16 --T 5 6 --Cb 0.55 0.65 --out "./salidas/optimization" --basename "task_grid" && open "./salidas/optimization/task_grid.pdf"

tasks.label: Test: Conectar con Maxsurf
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$(pwd)/herramientas" && python -m maxsurf_integration ping
